mcq.statement: In a lake, there are 10 steps labelled using alphabets from A to J. Starting from step A, every minute a frog jumps to the 4th step from where it started - that is from the step A it would go to the step E and from E it would go to the step 1 and from I it would go to C etc. Where would the frog be at the 60th minute if it starts at the step A?
